name: 8bitstudio
description:
8bitstudio is a Minneapolis web design company creatively bringing custom website solutions to uncharted waters. We excel in digital marketing, organic SEO, e-commerce, and steadfast responsive designs. Our fresh craftsmanship sets a course to develop superior websites for Minnesota businesses that can ride the rockiest waves.
Our Core Services Include:
Research & Digital Strategy
Design & Development (Websites, Web Apps, Digital Solutions)
Engagement (SEO, Blogs, etc.)
Domains, Email, Hosting
